</th><th>

</td></tr>

[Dataset](./paramanifest.dataset.md)


</td><td>

A set of data and parameters needed to present a chart in ParaCharts.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[DisplayType](./paramanifest.displaytype.md)


</td><td>

How this facet should be displayed on the chart


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Facet](./paramanifest.facet.md)


</td><td>

Metadata describing a facet of the chart which represents some dimension of the data.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Manifest](./paramanifest.manifest.md)


</td><td>

The data, parameters and settings needed to present a chart in ParaCharts.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[SeriesManifest](./paramanifest.seriesmanifest.md)


</td><td>

Metadata, and possibly inline data, describing a series on the chart.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Settings](./paramanifest.settings.md)


</td><td>

The settings needed to present a chart in ParaCharts.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Theme](./paramanifest.theme.md)


</td><td>

What quantities the line chart displays overall. Defaults to the theme of the single series ONLY in single series charts.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Theme1](./paramanifest.theme1.md)


</td><td>

What quantity the series measures.


</td></tr>

[XyPoint](./paramanifest.xypoint.md)


</td><td>

A datapoint on the graph.


</td></tr>
